title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using the ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar command, an output file is created with a .jar extension. However, the resulting file is not a valid jar file because it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: The ajc outjar command should create a valid jar file with the MANIFEST.MF file included.
EB: The output file created by the ajc outjar command does not include the required MANIFEST.MF file, making it an invalid jar file.
SR: To fix this issue, the ajc outjar command needs to include the MANIFEST.MF file in the generated jarfile.
